body:
SELECT
  a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[at0008]/value as T0_birthdate,
  b/data[at0001]/events[at0006]/data[at0003]/items[at0004]/value as T0_systolic,
  b/data[at0001]/events[at0006]/data[at0003]/items[at0005]/value as T0_diastolic,
  d/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[at0006]/value as T0_clinical_features_of_the_tia,
  d/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[at0007]/value as T0_duration_of_symptoms,
  d/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[at0008]/value as T0_history_of_diabetes,
  d/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[at0017]/value as T0_total_score,
  f/data[at0001]/items[at0002]/value as T0_risk_assessment,
  f/data[at0001]/items[at0006]/value as T0_2_day_stroke_risk,
  f/data[at0001]/items[at0007]/value as T0_7_day_stroke_risk,
  f/data[at0001]/items[at0008]/value as T0_90_day_stroke_risk
FROM
  EHR e CONTAINS COMPOSITION c CONTAINS (
    OBSERVATION a[openEHR-EHR-OBSERVATION.basic_demographic.v1]
    and OBSERVATION b[openEHR-EHR-OBSERVATION.blood_pressure.v2]
    and OBSERVATION d[openEHR-EHR-OBSERVATION.abcd2.v0]
    and EVALUATION f[openEHR-EHR-EVALUATION.abcd2_assessment.v0]
  )
LIMIT
  1
ORDER BY
  c/context/start_time/value DESC
